content:
Interesting. For Zulip 9.0 they are working on renaming streams to channels: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/28468

Makes sense. Calling them channels is much more common.

Maybe we can preemptively start calling them channels, like how we are preemptively calling dataverses collections. :grinning:
it's going to look like Zulip is copying Slack with its channels/threads... but Zulip was the OG!!
Yeah, I'm not sure where "streams" came from. Zulip is descended from Zephyr. :shrug:
As mentioned in #zulip > Zulip updates, streams have been renamed to channels.
